== Get File info ==
''lookup file for a given id'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': PUT [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /content/file/<id>/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': READ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': 400 Bad Request when trying to change the id [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': a File object [[BR]]
[[BR]]
